name: DigitalMediaCategory
title: Digital Media Category
description: Codes for high level media types - whether the media is an image, video, or audio.

concept.definition: The media consists of one or more unmoving images, including photographs, computer-generated graphs and charts, and scanned documents
The media consists of a series of frames that capture a moving image
The media consists of a sound recording
